channel.title: Comments on: Need More Even Games…

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Can you join the Kyu Level Study group in Nova? I want to get stronger so I started this group. Will you join?
item.content:encoded: Can you join the Kyu Level Study group in Nova? I want to get stronger so I started this group. Will you join?

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You should definitely play handicap games, but I would recommend only having a low percentage of those. Unless you're specifically trying to study handicap games for a special purpose, it's better to practice even games since you will not get in the habit of making overplays / underplays.
item.content:encoded: You should definitely play handicap games, but I would recommend only having a low percentage of those. Unless you’re specifically trying to study handicap games for a special purpose, it’s better to practice even games since you will not get in the habit of making overplays / underplays.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Absolutely! Those are critical! And in addition, getting games reviewed by stronger players is very important too!
item.content:encoded: Absolutely! Those are critical! And in addition, getting games reviewed by stronger players is very important too!

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: should I still play teaching games with stonger players online?
item.content:encoded: should I still play teaching games with stonger players online?
